title: Is league prepared for the prime spaghetti that is Sylas with Morde ult?
body:
I'm anticipating at least 100 new bugs
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: only 100? idk i think you are being too generous. id say two fiddy. 250
At some point, there has to be a critical mass beyond which the game can't keep going without crashing.
I predict when Sylus steals Mordekaisers ult, it will open a singularity and crash all league games in the process.
Is league also ready for a version of AP Jax with none of the usual drawbacks? {{champion:24}}  Stealing an ult which is mainly a passive element is so broken.
He actually converts the AD to armor ratio to an AP to armor ratio as well. So he gets a ton of armor and mr from it.
But the passive on every 3rd attack bonus damage based on AP is just soo much to pass up.
Speaking about this, how does Sylas' ult work with {{champion:76}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:150}} ...?

I think I read somewhere that with ults like Karma's where you cast the ult then another ability to actually make use of it, you just get access to the other abilities until you use one of them. Heimer's is similar I think

Yup. And form switch ults grant you their secondary form abilities until you recast the ult.

Gnar ult is usable without fury.

He get MegaNar's Ult (the massive shove stun)

For Karma and Dinger he presses the ult and then gets their other powers to pick from.

For Nid you press it and turn into a cat for the duration (80sish) and get all the cat powers and his Passive pros off them. Same with Elise

For Jayc he gets Jayc's Ranged powers for the duration but the scaling does not give any AD so they are weak
He transform into the champ and get their abilities for 30ish sec
At least Gnar is somewhat imaginable.

I believe it should be consumed when getting the dragon. 
P.s. Morde ult some how isnt weaker for having a pet dragon second part Like how Jax cant have decent base defenses because he has a windowed defensive buff ult or how Aatrox cant have decent anything cause he has a Revive ult and his revive was made weaker because its a revive.
What happens when there is a mord on both teams so he can steal it, and they both ult the same person?
I'm waiting for the Vandiril video
